com.fwdekker.randomness.word

Enum CapitalizationMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<CapitalizationMode>
      • com.fwdekker.randomness.word.CapitalizationMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CapitalizationMode>

    public enum CapitalizationMode
extends java.lang.Enum<CapitalizationMode>
    A mode in which a word should be capitalized.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      FIRST_LETTER
      Makes the first letter of each word uppercase.
      LOWER
      Makes all characters lowercase.
      RETAIN
      Does not change the string.
      SENTENCE
      Makes the first character uppercase and all characters after that lowercase.
      UPPER
      Makes all characters uppercase.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the name of the capitalization mode.

      Returns the function which capitalizes the given word to the mode's format.

      Returns the name of the capitalization mode.

      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
